name: StreamSounds
0:
”Alexa open Stream Sounds”
”Alexa ask Stream Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stream sounds
des:
Immerse yourself in the tranquil melodies of nature with Stream Sounds, your personal gateway to peace and relaxation. Crafted for those who seek a momentary retreat from the hustle and bustle of everyday life, this Alexa skill envelops you in the pure, soothing sounds of a gentle water stream, transporting you to a serene oasis.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Stream Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
